author: chirino
msg: - do a pageFile.flush() after every commit garantee that the data is persisted to disk on commit.
- better initialization logic to cope with the case were page file is created but process is killed before the root index is created.

author: odeakin
msg: Remove error printf() - loadImpl is only called (indirectly) from MappedByteBuffer.load(). Since that method is a "best effort" to load into physical memory, we should not print an error when that load fails. Just return an error value (this matches the behaviour on Unix).
